description: Evaluates device positions against the geofence geometries from a given geofence collection. This operation always returns an empty response because geofences are asynchronously evaluated. The evaluation determines if the device has entered or exited a geofenced area, and then publishes one of the following events to Amazon EventBridge:

parameters.name: CollectionName
parameters.description: The geofence collection used in evaluating the position of devices against its geofences.

parameters.name: DevicePositionUpdates
parameters.description: Contains device details for each device to be evaluated against the given geofence collection. (dict) --- Contains the position update details for a device. The device associated to the position update. The timestamp at which the device's position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ The latest device position defined in WGS 84 format: [X or longitude, Y or latitude]. (float) --- Accuracy (dict) --- The accuracy of the device position. Estimated maximum distance, in meters, between the measured position and the true position of a device, along the Earth's surface. PositionProperties (dict) --- Associates one of more properties with the position update. A property is a key-value pair stored with the position update and added to any geofence event the update may trigger. Format: "key" : "value" (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: DeviceId
nested_params.description: The device associated to the position update.

nested_params.name: SampleTime
nested_params.description: The timestamp at which the device's position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_params.name: Position
nested_params.description: The latest device position defined in WGS 84 format: [X or longitude, Y or latitude].

nested_params.name: Accuracy
nested_params.description: The accuracy of the device position.

nested_params.name: Horizontal
nested_params.description: Estimated maximum distance, in meters, between the measured position and the true position of a device, along the Earth's surface.

nested_params.name: PositionProperties
nested_params.description: Associates one of more properties with the position update. A property is a key-value pair stored with the position update and added to any geofence event the update may trigger. Format: "key" : "value"

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Contains error details for each device that failed to evaluate its position against the given geofence collection.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The device associated with the position evaluation error.

nested_items.name: SampleTime
nested_items.description: Specifies a timestamp for when the error occurred in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the batch request error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message with the reason for the batch request error.
